Package chess.src

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.src.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board class: Sets up the board with a 8x8 2d array and displays it in ASCII form along with the white and black pieces. Includes constructors to initialize a new Board, methdos that check for valid moves, and methods that display the board and pieces.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Board()
      Constructor that creates the Pieces to line up on the checkered board for team white and black.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Constructor that creates the Pieces to line up on the checkered board for team white and black. Each white and black piece will be inserted into the empty array by calling each subclass (King, Knight, Rook, etc) derived from the Piece class Row 0 includes all black pieces except for Pawns. Row 7 includes all white pieces except for Pawns. End of the constructor adds the rows 1 and 6 with Pawn pieces using a for loop.

    • Method Detail

      • printBoard

        public void printBoard()
        This method traverses the 8x8 2d array and prints "##" and " " using a nested loop (doesn't include the pieces). If the remainder of the total of iterations i and j is 0, print " " otherwise, print "##". Prints char array for bottom end row. Prints number column for right end.

      • isAttack

        public boolean isAttack​(int row,
                        int col,
                        boolean isWhite)
        Boolean method that checks if a piece is under attack for an Enpassant.
        Parameters:
        row - Takes the row of the piece.
        col - Takes the column of the piece.
        isWhite - Takes the color of the piece.
        Returns:
        Returns whether the piece is under attack by the opponent (true or false).

      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove​(java.lang.String fileRank,
                        java.lang.String fileRank2,
                        boolean isWhite)
        Boolean method that makes moves and Enpassant.
        Parameters:
        fileRank - First input.
        fileRank2 - Second input.
        isWhite - Color of the piece.
        Returns:
        Returns wheter it is possible to make a move (true or false).

      • isInCheck

        public boolean isInCheck​(boolean isWhite)
        Boolean method to identify check.
        Parameters:
        isWhite - Color of the piece.
        Returns:
        true or false boolean value.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        toReturn

      • allPossibleMoves

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> allPossibleMoves​(boolean isWhite,
                                                                     Piece[][] b)
        Static method that records all the possible moves that can be made and stores them in an arraylist.
        Parameters:
        isWhite - Color of the piece.
        b - Board
        Returns:
        moves Returns an arraylist filled with all the possible moves that can be made.
